channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.6.76
item.description:
About v10.6.76 Update

  • v10.6.76: Improved __DropAllKeys__.
  • v10.6.75: Minor update of multitouch extension.
  • v10.6.74: "high_priority" attribute has been introduced into <identifier> tag.
  • v10.6.73: Minor update of multitouch extension.
  • v10.6.73: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.72: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION has been improved.
  • v10.6.71: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.70: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ with PointingButton has been improved.
  • v10.6.69: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.68: Minor update.
  • v10.6.67: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.66: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.65: `<appdef>` behavior has been improved. It preserves prepared settings when you use `<appdef>` in private.xml for bundle identifiers that are in prepared appdef.xml.
  • v10.6.64: Fixed issue:
    • Some Java apps might be crash when AXNotifier is enabled. (RazorSQL, EditRocket)
  • v10.6.63: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.62: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.61: ModifierFlag pattern matching has been introduced into Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP.
  • v10.6.60: Reduce unnecessary modifier key events in __KeyOverlaidModifier__ and __HoldingKeyToKey__.
  • v10.6.59: Minor update.
  • v10.6.58: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.57: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.56: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.55: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.54: Reduce unnecessary modifier events.
  • v10.6.53: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.51: Fast User Switching support has been improved.
  • v10.6.50: Minor update.
  • v10.6.49: Add Quicksilver support into AXNotifier.
  • v10.6.48: Option::KEYTOKEY_INCREASE_MODIFIER_FLAGS has been added.
  • v10.6.47: Improved __DropAllKeys__.
  • v10.6.46: Improved __DropAllKeys__.
  • v10.6.45: Change __DropKey__ to __DropAllKeys__ and improved it.
  • v10.6.44: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.43: Change Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW_WITH_ORIGINAL_EVENTS to Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_POST_FROM_EVENTS_AS_RAW.
  • v10.6.42: Minor update.
  • v10.6.41: Improved `Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW_WITH_ORIGINAL_EVENTS`.
  • v10.6.40: `Option::SIMULTANEOUSKEYPRESSES_RAW_WITH_ORIGINAL_EVENTS` has been added.
  • v10.6.39: Improved __DropKey__.
  • v10.6.37: Improved modifier treatment in __HoldingKeyToKey__.
  • Incompatibility changes:
    • v10.6.36: The default mouse keys scroll direction has been changed to `natural`.
  • v10.6.35: Minor update.
  • v10.6.34: Multiple displays support has been improved. The status message will be shown in the all screen.
  • v10.6.33: Minor update.
  • v10.6.32: "Status Message > Show caps lock state" option has been added.
  • v10.6.31: Minor update.
  • v10.6.29: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.28: <background/> support to <vkopenurldef> has been added.
  • v10.6.27: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.26: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION has been improved.
  • v10.6.25: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION has been improved.
  • v10.6.24: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.23: Fixed a Sparkle issue that has been introduced at v10.6.22.
  • v10.6.22: Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION has been improved.
  • v10.6.22: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.21: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.20: Option::KEYTOKEY_TIMEOUT has been renamed to Option::KEYTOKEY_DELAYED_ACTION.
  • v10.6.19: Option::KEYTOKEY_TIMEOUT has been improved.
  • v10.6.18: Option::KEYTOKEY_TIMEOUT has been improved.
  • v10.6.17: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.16: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.15: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.14: Option::KEYTOKEY_TIMEOUT has been added.
  • v10.6.13: New option has been added into command line interface: `toggle`
  • v10.6.12: Fixed issue: post-hid-event command was not included in the package.
  • v10.6.11: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.10: Fixed issue:
    • Some Java apps might be crash when AXNotifier is enabled. (Eclipse)
  • v10.6.9: The following filters have been added.
    • <pressingphysicalkeys_greaterthan>
    • <pressingphysicalkeys_lessthan>
  • v10.6.8: A command line tool has been added: post-hid-event.
  • v10.6.7: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.6: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.5: Fixed issue:
    • Some Java apps might be crash when AXNotifier is enabled. (Screencast-O-Matic)
  • v10.6.4: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.3: __HoldingKeyToKey__ has been improved at you pressed modifiers while holding target key down.
  • v10.6.2: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.1: Prepared settings have been updated.
Karabiner Web Site
